{"city": "Walnut Creek", "state": "CA", "name": "Mobile Pantry Distribution", "address": "1924 Trinity Avenue,", "phone": "925-937-2817", "notes": "Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Get Food Walnut Creek Printer Friendly List Mobile Pantry Distribution Families and individuals can pick up FREE fresh produce, proteins, dairy and a variety of nonperishable food once or twice a month. Please choose ONE location. St. Paul's Episcopal Church , 1924 Trinity Avenue, Walnut Creek , 3rd Thursday 10:00am-12:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Partner Food Pantry Pantries provide FREE food to the public. Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. St. Mary’s Catholic Church (SVdP) , 1186 Bont Lane, Walnut Creek , Thursday 12:30-4:30pm. Phone: 925-937-2817 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Support Life Foundation: Walnut Creek , 2449 Buena Vista Ave Ste 3, Walnut Creek , Friday 10:00-11:00am. Phone: 510-541-6293 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Walnut Creek Church of Christ , 500 Minert Rd, Walnut Creek , 1st & 3rd Thursday 10:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 925-825-7810 x1 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Walnut Creek Presbyterian , 1753 Lacassie Ave, Walnut Creek , .
							Open by appointment only. Please call 925-937-3978 on Tuesday between 1-4 pm or Wednesday/Friday between 9 am-12 pm to schedule a pick-up. No drop-ins available. Phone: 925-937-3978 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Partner Soup Kitchen Soup kitchens provide FREE meals to anyone who comes in during meal hours. Menus vary, although each soup kitchen tries to offer balanced meals. St. Paul's Trinity Center , 1888 Trinity Ave, Walnut Creek , Monday-Friday 8:00-9:00am & 12:15-1:15pm.
							Membership is required for the 8:00-9:00am time slot. Phone: 925-949-8712 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Senior Food Program FREE groceries twice a month to individuals aged 55 or older who meet income guidelines. Only one senior per household can receive food. Bring a picture ID and proof of address (PG&E bill, for example). Walnut Creek United Methodist Church , 1543 Sunnyvale Ave, Walnut Creek , 1st & 3rd Thursday 9:30-10:30am. Printer Friendly List Locations Concord: 925-676-7543 4010 Nelson Ave
Concord, CA 94520 Fairfield: 707-421-9777 2370 N Watney Way
